tasks.task: Participate in a five-week training program for agricultural practices.
subtasks: Attend classes on good agricultural practices.

tasks.task: Network and strengthen relationships among farmers.
subtasks: Engage in knowledge sharing among farmers.

tasks.task: Evolve as a farmer and businessman.
subtasks: Continuously learn and improve agricultural practices.
Adapt as a businessman to succeed in the market.
Create a premium product to add value.
Take advantage of opportunities provided by the project.

tasks.task: Communicate the benefits of the training program.
subtasks: Report on the training program's success.
Highlight the importance of education and attitude in agriculture.
